title: Area of electric meter/service utility room/rooms having area of 10 sq
clause_text: Area of electric meter/service utility room/rooms having area of 10 sq. m per 50 tenements at Basement /Ground/Stilt/Podium. In case of High Rise building the meter room may be allowed as per the specific requirements of Electric Supply Company. Refuse Chute/Garbage Shaft as specified in Regulation No.37(12)
